wikipedia_page.main: John Michael Wraw (4 February 1959 – 25 July 2017) was a British Anglican bishop. He served as the Bishop of Bradwell, an area bishop in the Church of England Diocese of Chelmsford, from 2012 until his death in post in July 2017.

response: |align="center"| 2012  ||align="center"| 2017 || John Wraw || Previously Archdeacon of Wilts; died in post, 25 July 2017.
*2004–2012 (res.): John Wraw (became area Bishop of Bradwell)

link_mentions.page: Becket Keys Church of England School
response: The head teacher of Becket Keys is Andrew Scott-Evans. He was also the original proposer for the school.  The school was officially dedicated by Bishop John Wraw on 5 October 2012. It has been established at the former campus of Sawyers Hall College.
